0.name: The Spectator
0.description: You prefer to observe life from the sidelines. You value privacy and routine but often feel overwhelmed by stress.
0.happiness_tip: Start small. Pick one routine and stick to it.

1.name: The Stoic
1.description: Calm, detached, and pragmatic. You are unshakeable in a crisis but can come across as cold.
1.happiness_tip: Practice 'active empathy.' Ask others how they feel.

2.name: The Skeptic
2.description: Kind-hearted but anxious. You often worry about what others think and may have trouble asserting yourself.
2.happiness_tip: Learn to say 'No.' Your desire to please leads to burnout.

3.name: The Rock
3.description: Easy-going, stable, and friendly. A low-maintenance friend who goes with the flow.
3.happiness_tip: Set a goal. Contentment can lead to stagnation.

4.name: The Loner
4.description: Impulsive and reactive. You seek stimulation but often find yourself in conflicts.
4.happiness_tip: Pause before reacting. Count to ten when angry.

5.name: The Maverick
5.description: Bold and energetic. You enjoy the hustle but don't mind stepping on toes.
5.happiness_tip: Collaborate more. Stop viewing everyone as a competitor.

6.name: The Socialite
6.description: The life of the party, but prone to drama. You seek approval and are sensitive to rejection.
6.happiness_tip: Spend time alone. Learn to be comfortable by yourself.

7.name: The Good Neighbor
7.description: Friendly, resilient, and fun-loving. You enjoy popular hobbies and keeping things simple.
7.happiness_tip: Try planning ahead. Structure will help you achieve dreams.

8.name: The Worker Bee
8.description: Diligent but anxious. You work hard and follow the rules, but worry about making mistakes.
8.happiness_tip: Celebrate wins. Don't just focus on what could go wrong.

9.name: The Technician
9.description: Disciplined and stable. You focus on facts and results, often ignoring social niceties.
9.happiness_tip: Soften your delivery. Bluntness can alienate people.

10.name: The Assistant
10.description: Dutiful, kind, and anxious. You live to serve but often neglect yourself.
10.happiness_tip: Delegate. You don't have to do everything yourself.

11.name: The Administrator
11.description: Reliable, stable, kind, and organized. You keep the world running smoothly.
11.happiness_tip: Take a risk. You might miss out on unplanned opportunities.

12.name: The Drill Sergeant
12.description: Loud, organized, and demanding. You have high energy but can be stressful to be around.
12.happiness_tip: Practice patience. Intensity burns out your team.

13.name: The Manager
13.description: A natural leader. Organized, outgoing, and thick-skinned. Focuses on efficiency.
13.happiness_tip: Listen more. Feedback makes you a better leader.

14.name: The Host
14.description: You love organizing events but stress over every detail. You want everyone to be happy.
14.happiness_tip: Let go of perfection. People enjoy the party because of you.

15.name: The Pillar
15.description: The Model Citizen. Social, organized, kind, and resilient.
15.happiness_tip: Question the status quo. Rarely asks if the rules are fair.

16.name: The Dreamer
16.description: Creative but disorganized and anxious. You have a rich inner world.
16.happiness_tip: Build a routine. A schedule helps bring ideas to life.

17.name: The Poet
17.description: Independent and creative. You follow your own muse and can be perceived as eccentric.
17.happiness_tip: Connect. Sharing your perspective is rewarding.

18.name: The Empath
18.description: Deeply sensitive and creative. You feel the world intensely.
18.happiness_tip: Create boundaries. Shield yourself from negative energy.

19.name: The Philosopher
19.description: Peaceful and creative. You enjoy abstract ideas but prefer a low-pressure life.
19.happiness_tip: Take action. Don't just think thoughts; share them.

20.name: The Agitator
20.description: Chaotic and creative. You challenge authority and bore easily.
20.happiness_tip: Choose your battles. Save energy for projects.

21.name: The Daredevil
21.description: Adventurous and fearless. You love new experiences but dislike rules.
21.happiness_tip: Think long-term. You need a plan for tomorrow.

22.name: The Performer
22.description: Charismatic and emotional. You love to entertain but struggle with deadlines.
22.happiness_tip: Focus. Pick one idea and finish it.

23.name: The Happy Wanderer
23.description: Enthusiastic and open-minded. You love everyone but lack direction.
23.happiness_tip: Find a mentor to help channel your energy.

24.name: The Mad Scientist
24.description: Brilliant and obsessive. Creative and organized, but anxious.
24.happiness_tip: Step away from work. Go outside.

25.name: The Architect
25.description: Strategic and cold. You build systems and prefer complex ideas over people.
25.happiness_tip: Practice soft skills to sell your ideas.

26.name: The Devotee
26.description: Creative and disciplined. You work tirelessly for a cause but worry constantly.
26.happiness_tip: Trust the process. Relaxing makes you productive.

27.name: The Professor
27.description: The ideal academic. Curious, disciplined, and stable.
27.happiness_tip: Share your knowledge. Don't stay in your tower.

28.name: The Commander
28.description: Ambitious and intense. You have big vision but can burn bridges.
28.happiness_tip: Decompress. If you don't rest, you will crash.

29.name: The Innovator
29.description: A visionary leader. New ideas, discipline, and confidence.
29.happiness_tip: Value harmony. Being right isn't everything.

30.name: The Teacher
30.description: Passionate and organized. You love helping others grow but take failures personally.
30.happiness_tip: Detach with love. You cannot walk the path for them.

31.name: The Polymath
31.description: The Golden Profile. High in all 5 traits. Potential to succeed anywhere.
31.happiness_tip: Focus. The hardest part is choosing what to do.
